title: Plans to visit the United States

content.question:
Task 3: Conversation

You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak.

Introduction:

You will have a phone conversation with Wang Lin, a friend of yours, about his plans to visit the United States with his family.

Response 1
